message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_FV_NO_OF_UNITS_BLANK
message.locale: The number of units must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_FV_DERLIVERY_DATE_GREATER_THAN_TODAY
message.locale: The Delivery Date cannot be greater than today's date.

message.name: ERR_PT_CREATE_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_FOR_CANCELED_PLANNED_ITEM
message.locale: You cannot create a service unit delivery for a canceled planned item.
You cannot create a service unit delivery for a cancelled planned item.

message.name: ERR_PT_MODIFY_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_FOR_CANCELED_PLANNED_ITEM
message.locale: This record cannot be modified as it has already been canceled.
This record cannot be modified as it has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_FV_TOTAL_NO_UNITS_GREATER_THAN_AUTHORIZED_UNITS
message.locale: The total number of units cannot exceed the number of authorized units. The number of authorized units must be modified before additional units can be recorded.
The total number of units cannot exceed the number of authorised units. The number of authorised units must be modified before additional units can be recorded.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_CANCELED
message.locale: This record cannot be modified as it has already been cancelled.
This record cannot be modified as it has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: This service unit delivery has already been cancelled.
This record has already been canceled.

message.name: ERR_SERVICE_UNIT_DELIVERY_CANNOT_RECORD_NO_UNIT_TYPE
message.locale: Service Units cannot be recorded as this plan item has not been associated with a type of unit.

message.name: ERR_MODIFY_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to maintain this plan item

message.name: ERR_VIEW_PARTICIPANT_CHECK_FAILED
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate privileges to view this plan item
